author: wtopstaff
title: Blue Jays Postseason History
text:
Home » News » Sports » MLB » Blue Jays Postseason History Blue Jays Postseason History By The Associated Press  19 am 
The postseason history of the Toronto Blue Jays: World Series (Won 2, Lost 0) 
1993 — Beat Philadelphia Phillies, 4-2 
1992 — Beat Atlanta Braves, 4-2 
Record — Won 8, Lost 4 League Championship Series (Won 2, Lost 4) 
2015 — Lost to Kansas City Royals, 4-2 
1993 — Beat Chicago White Sox, 4-2 
1992 — Beat Oakland A’s, 4-2 
1991 — Lost to Minnesota Twins, 4-1 
1989 — Lost to Oakland A’s, 4-1 
1985 — Lost to Kansas City Royals, 4-3 
Record — Won 15, Lost 20 Divisional Playoff Series (Won 1, Lost 0) 
2015 — Beat Texas Rangers, 3-2 
Record — Won 3, Lost 2 Topics:
